amendment.description: An amendment numbered 94 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds from being used to remove any monument on land under the jurisdiction of the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 227 (Roll no. 583).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 227 (Roll no. 583).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
